creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: head, arms and torso of nude young girl with a cloth draped over her PR arm; girl twists the ends of her long blonde hair; muted colors: pinks, greys, yellow, green
provenance: Gabriel and Yvonne Weisberg, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2004.
signed: LLC, bottom edge, in brown: [(illegible) ko B Paris]
title: Young Girl at Her Bath
